creator: bogdan.maris@softvision.ro
summary: Tracking protection tour keeps animating even though it's already in focus when clicking the option from hamburger menu

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

comments.text:
[Affected versions]:
- Nightly 62.0a1

[Affected platforms]:
- macOS 10.13.5
- Ubuntu 18.04
- Windows 10 64bit

[Steps to reproduce]:
- Open Firefox
- Open Hamburger menu and click Tracking protection
- Repeat the above step a few times

[Expected result]:
- Nothing happens since Tracking protection options inside about:preferences#privacy is already in focus

[Actual result]:
- Tracking protection tour keeps animating even though it's in focus

[Regression range]:
- Not a regression since its also reproducible on the build where this was introduced, Nightly 2018-06-01

[Additional notes]:
- Here is a screencast showing the issue: https://drive.google.com/open?id=13SLxpHhvQMhfpoIAF2D7_eIGnXSuqRAO (the screencast was made on ubuntu, .mp4 file and it would not work if I would have added it to bugzilla directly)
comments.author: bogdan.maris@softvision.ro

comments.text: One could argue that this is good because it draws renewed attention to the section. In any case even if we think this is a problem the severity is low enough to put it on P5, and I would argue that there's no incentive to fix this unless we have further indication that this is confusing to users.
comments.author: jhofmann@mozilla.com
